mapper.insert: insert into Sheet_Music (music_name, beat, tone, username, state, abc, insert_date, introduction) values (#{music_name},#{beat},#{tone},#{username},'待审核',#{abc},now(),#{introduction});
mapper.select: select * from Sheet_Music where music_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{music_name}),'%')
mapper.update: update Sheet_Music set music_name = #{music_name}, beat = #{beat}, tone = #{tone}, last_update_date = now(), state = #{state}, abc = #{abc}, introduction = #{introduction} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from Sheet_Music where state = '通过'
select * from Sheet_Music where state = '通过' and music_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{music_name}),'%')
mapper.update: update Sheet_Music set music_name = #{music_name}, beat = #{beat}, tone = #{tone}, last_update_date = now(), abc = #{abc}, introduction = #{introduction} state = '待审核' where id = #{id}
